fields.name: name
fields.label: Parameter Name
fields.help: The parameter name (this is sent as HTTP param or key towards algo).

fields.name: label
fields.label: Parameter Label
fields.help: The field label which is displayed.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.placeholder: e.g. How many iterations should the algorithm perform.

fields.name: type
fields.label: Parameter Type
fields.help: The field type (text, number, boolean, select). This influences how the parameter is displayed for the consumer before the asset is used.

fields.name: options
fields.label: Select Options
fields.help: For select types, a list of options.
